beans.description:
This adaptor does the following...
* reads swift records from file * converts records into SwiftMessage Objects * writes messages to console (stdout)
It is designed to illustrate the basic structure of an adaptor which uses swift messages
It may be started as follows java org.openadaptor.spring.SpringAdaptor -config swift-reader.xml
The classpath should include the following:
lib lib/openadaptor.jar lib/openadaptor-spring.jar lib/openadaptor-depends.jar

bean.description: Pipeline to read from file, convert swift message and write to console

Default output format is raw swift text (SwiftConvertor.FORMAT_SWIFT_RAW) Other options are: Swift message as XML (SwiftConvertor.FORMAT_SWIFT_XML) Swift message as Java Object (SwiftConvertor.FORMAT_SWIFT_OBJECT)
Without a filenam configures, this will just write to the console (stdout)
